results.title: How to use structured outputs with Azure OpenAI in Microsoft Foundry Models - Azure OpenAI
results.description: Structured outputs are recommended for function calling, extracting structured data, and building complex multi-step workflows. results.title: Use ai.generate_response with pandas - Microsoft Fabric
results.description: Use ai.generate_response with pandas The ai.generate_response function uses generative AI to generate custom text responses that are based on your own instructions, with a single line of code. results.title: Streamlining Data Preparation with Pydantic: A 25-Minute Guide
results.description: Episode Streamlining Data Preparation with Pydantic: A 25-Minute Guide | Python Data Science Day with Hasan Özdemir Python Data Science Day Embark on a 25-minute journey exploring the power of Pydantic in cleaning and preparing data for seamless integration into your Python projects. We'll delve into the versatile capabilities of Pydantic for data.
